column4: can anybody tel me wtf keeps tarshing my /etc/network/interfaces file? i have found various comment sbaout it being network amanger pr avahi, but i have removed both and it still keeps getting overwritten. Have also tried the kernel cmd line STATICIP thing but that isnt helping either
